text: The 1989 Nippon Professional Baseball season was the 40th season of operation for the league. ==Regular season standings== ===Central League=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" style="text-align:center;" ! width="35%" | Central Leaguehttp://npb.jp/bis/yearly/centralleague_1989.html ! width="5%" | G ! width="5%" | W ! width="5%" | L ! width="5%" | T ! width="7%" | Pct. ! width="5%" | GB |- align=center |- style="background-color:#fdd" |Yomiuri Giants || 130 || 84 || 44 || 2 || .656 || -- |- align=center |Hiroshima Toyo Carp || 130 || 73 || 51 || 6 || .589 || 9.0 |- align=center |Chunichi Dragons || 130 || 68 || 59 || 3 || .535 || 15.5 |- align=center |Yakult Swallows || 130 || 55 || 72 || 3 || .433 || 28.5 |- align=center |Hanshin Tigers || 130 || 54 || 75 || 1 || .419 || 30.5 |- align=center |Yokohama Taiyo Whales || 130 || 47 || 80 || 3 || .370 || 36.5 |} ===Pacific League=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" style="text-align:center;" ! width="35%" | Pacific Leaguehttp://npb.jp/bis/yearly/pacificleague_1989.html ! width="5%" | G ! width="5%" | W ! width="5%" | L ! width="5%" | T ! width="7%" | Pct. ! width="5%" | GB |- align=center |- style="background-color:#fdd" |Kintetsu Buffaloes || 130 || 71 || 54 || 5 || .568 || -- |- align=center |Orix Braves || 130 || 72 || 55 || 3 || .567 || 0.0 |- align=center |Seibu Lions || 130 || 69 || 53 || 8 || .566 || 0.5 |- align=center |Fukuoka Daiei Hawks || 130 || 59 || 64 || 7 || .480 || 11.0 |- align=center |Nippon-Ham Fighters || 130 || 54 || 73 || 3 || .425 || 18.0 |- align=center |Lotte Orions || 130 || 48 || 74 || 8 || .393 || 21.5 |} ==Japan Series== ==See also== *1989 Major League Baseball season ==References== Category:1989 in baseball Category:1989 in Japanese sport
